Happy Birthday Nevada!

Given the massive shock our nation‚Äôs healthcare industry has weathered over the past year, I believe Congress should do all it can to support our healthcare professionals. I appreciate the NV Orthopaedic Society representatives making the trip for this productive conversation.

I met with the Nevada Orthopaedic Society to discuss a number of important issues, including safeguarding healthcare providers from impending Medicare payment cuts and removing obstacles to care for Nevadans on Medicare Advantage plans. https://t.co/NAmPm0WMwj

This Oct. I'm proud to join my fellow Italian-Americans in recognizing our shared heritage.

Together we remember our ancestors & pay tribute to their achievements.

We celebrate the strong Italian-American partnership that binds our countries together economically & culturally.
We had a good discussion on NV Energy‚Äôs efforts to improve right-of-way and transmission line maintenance to help protect our communities from the growing threat of wildfires.

The energy sector is crucial to our economic growth, not only in Nevada, but also nationwide.

It is only fitting that the Carson City Mint played such a significant role in numismatic history and in this Commemorative Morgan Silver Dollar Coin Program.

More information on this historic presentation here:
https://t.co/eNIuZw7sqU

I thank @usmint Director Ryder, whose collaboration has been integral to the legislation authorizing this program and inclusion of the ‚ÄúCC‚Äù mint mark. Thanks also goes to Nevada State Museum Director Freedman in hosting this historic moment.

Today, we celebrated the 100th anniversary of the last Morgan Dollar minted in the U.S. The historical significance of the Carson City Mint is an integral part of who we are. I was honored to present a 2021 Commemorative ‚ÄúCC‚Äù mint mark Morgan Dollar to the Nevada State Museum. https://t.co/2Bh3L2GQTh

For more information, please visit this link ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/HArFZZ89OU

The #DixieFire started on July 13, has burned about 432,800 acres, & is 35% contained.

On July 20 @fema approved a request submitted by the State of California for a Fire Management Assistance Grant, which allows federal funding to cover up to 75% of eligible firefighting costs.

As the #DixieFire in Eastern California continues to spread, I wanted to provide an update for anyone whose family may be impacted.

To stay equipped with the latest information, please check the link below ‚¨áÔ∏è

Having been born and raised in Carson City, I'm glad this chapter of NV‚Äôs history is being honored w/ the ‚ÄúCC‚Äù privy mark. At the Philadelphia Mint, where 2021 Morgan Dollars honoring Carson City are being produced, I met w/ designers and engravers integral to this new program. https://t.co/dzbEUnqBKO

From 1870-1893, gold and silver coins with the iconic ‚ÄúCC‚Äù mark were minted at our very own Carson City Mint. After legislation I helped draft was signed into law by President Trump earlier this year, the Mint began producing the first new Morgan and Peace dollars in many years.

As our strongest ally in the Middle East, America must uphold its commitment to Israel during these challenging times by supporting its right to defend itself against terrorism. I pledge to stand with Israel & hope that peace can be restored as soon as possible.

As a champion of the travel & tourism industry, which is vital to NV‚Äôs economy, I‚Äôm honored to receive the 2021 Global Travel Advocate Award from @ASTAadvisors. Teamed up with the entire #Nevada Delegation to intro the #LakeTahoe Restoration Reauthorization Act which continues to provide $415M to prevent imminent threats & combat invasive species in the Tahoe Basin through 2034. More here: https://t.co/fyNDkAML9T

A special thanks to the @LibnOfCongress and the Library‚Äôs preservation experts for having me and explaining how this funding is used to support some of the challenges faced when restoring these delicate artifacts. https://t.co/m3MZhluhQz

This week, I toured a LOC Preservation Lab to see how funding is being used for preservation activities. During my tour, I viewed several artifacts from its collection, including original photos from Pres. Lincoln‚Äôs inauguration & a hand-drawn map of the West from the 1850s.

As a Member of the @HouseAppropsGOP Legislative Branch Subcommittee, I have a responsibility to conduct oversight on the federal funding allocated to Legislative Branch agencies such as the @librarycongress.

I recently had the opportunity to revisit the Hawthorne Army Depot for an update on their mission and collaboration with the @NVNationalGuard. A huge thanks to their staff for showing me around. https://t.co/TMwsTkHlf9

It‚Äôs an honor to receive the Friend of the Farm Bureau award for my service during the 116th Congress. I‚Äôm proud to stand with Nevada‚Äôs agricultural community and will continue fighting for policies that support our hardworking farmers and ranchers. https://t.co/VX2nzMJ1yG
Today, I voted against House Democrats‚Äô unprecedented attempt to remove a Member of Congress from her standing committee assignments. My full statement here: https://t.co/3n89jryH6a

Recognizing the more than 200 members of the @NVNationalGuard who are deploying to our nation‚Äôs capital this week. A big thank you to them & the thousands of @USNationalGuard members currently working in DC. We‚Äôre grateful for your service & commitment to keeping our nation safe.
My full statement on today‚Äôs impeachment vote: https://t.co/C1azMt6ud5 https://t.co/n5m2JEbsly
January 6, 2021: History made today for all the wrong reasons. Shameful. All our Washington staff are safe.

I‚Äôll be joining the @thedanmasonshow LIVE from Washington at 3 PM PT (6 PM ET). Tune into @NewsTalk780KOH at the top of the hour to hear our full discussion surrounding the opening session of the 117th Congress.

Thank you to the frontline health care workers and first responders in #Nevada and across the country for your tremendous work during this challenging time. My colleagues and I are truly grateful for everything you‚Äôre doing in our communities. https://t.co/13WPJEZnmg

Wishing you and your family a safe & happy #Thanksgiving. I‚Äôd also like to send a special thanks to those defending our freedoms overseas, who can‚Äôt make it home this year, & all of CD-2‚Äôs local food banks & organizations who are helping to support those in need this holiday. https://t.co/kkRl0jn3Uk

Happy Veterans Day to all my fellow vets, including my oldest daughter Ryanne who served in the @USNavy. Thank you for your service and for your unwavering commitment to our great nation. https://t.co/hMeNwZLV42
Tune into @NewsTalk780KOH this morning around the top of the hour. I‚Äôll be joining @TheDanMasonShow LIVE around 8:05 AM PT (11:05 AM ET). Listen online here: https://t.co/d1r6GMxoVM
Sending my best wishes to @realDonaldTrump & @FLOTUS for a speedy recovery.
Today, we honor and celebrate the @USAirForce. Thank you for 73 years of service. #USAF73 https://t.co/CFfG6tgxsh

Deeply saddened to learn of Mayor Bob Crowell‚Äôs passing. As a Vietnam Vet, retired Navy Captain, & dedicated public servant with a lifetime of achievement, Bob was one of Carson‚Äôs and NV‚Äôs finest, & my thoughts go out to his family. My full statement: https://t.co/ABZNr0M7a0

Today, we honor the lives lost in the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001. Please join me this #PatriotDay as we remember the bravery displayed and sacrifices made by so many of our fellow Americans 19 years ago. We will #NeverForget. https://t.co/hoTMKtv01I

Thank you @POTUS & @ChaoSecretary for continuing to make Nevada a priority. This $23M investment in our infrastructure builds upon @RTCWashoe‚Äôs continued success & will significantly improve our transportation systems in #NV02. My full statement here: https://t.co/N7rZY5vYSY

Deeply saddened to learn of the passing of Mayor Ron Smith, a dedicated public servant, a valued leader, & an inspiration to many in our community. This is a great loss for NV & I extend my heartfelt condolences to his family, friends, & the entire @cityofsparks.

100 years ago today, the #19thAmendment was ratified, acknowledging women‚Äôs right to vote. Please join me today as we come together to celebrate a century of Women's Suffrage in America & honor the courageous women who ushered us toward a more perfect union. https://t.co/RgCHoM6tDQ
It‚Äôs been a privilege to work with @RTCWashoe & @FTA_DOT to secure critical funding for this project, and I congratulate them on a job well done! Come on down to Midtown! https://t.co/mPmiNO4P4C

I‚Äôd also like to recognize @BettyMcCollum04, @RepDaveJoyce, and each of their staffs for helping us advance this priority on behalf of the #SilverState. It‚Äôs an honor to serve with each of them on the Interior Subcommittee and I‚Äôm thankful for their efforts on this issue.

After learning of this issue, my office has been committed to delivering a solution that would ensure the continued health and safety of UNR students & faculty while on campus ‚Äì so we‚Äôre encouraged our efforts have paid off & UNR will receive the full amount of funding requested.

Great news for @unevadareno today! @Interior just announced it will award $12M for the cleanup of UNR‚Äôs historic Facilities Services Building after it tested positive for Radium-226 contamination in 2016: https://t.co/M51n375oEh

It‚Äôs incredibly disrespectful to all Americans when issues for the greater good are put on the back burner for partisan objectives. We‚Äôve seen the results Congress can deliver when we work together: nearly $3T in #COVID19 relief so far. Americans cannot wait any longer.

So for those angered by the President‚Äôs recent executive action on covid relief which includes payroll tax cuts, preventing evictions, and extending UI & student loan relief, please remember that when leadership refuses to work together, the Executive Branch is forced to step in.

Political gridlock solves nothing. At the end of July, Republicans tried to extend unemployment insurance and Chuck and Nancy said no. It‚Äôs been nearly 2 weeks and there‚Äôs still no deal, no compromise, and no sign of action being taken on behalf of the American people.

Now more than ever, we must continue looking for solutions that ensure the most responsible use of your hard-earned taxpayer dollars, & this bill does so in a balanced, bipartisan, and efficient way. More here: https://t.co/wwUF7oZIaU
In fact, the @USGAO has even recommended Congress take this approach, stating ‚Äúthe Mint might not be producing coins as cost-effectively as possible.‚Äù

Teamed up with @RepJoshG to intro the Coin Metal Modification Authorization & Cost Savings Act, a common-sense and balanced approach that will save hardworking taxpayers millions of dollars annually by allowing the @usmint to modify the metallic composition of coins.

We‚Äôve directly assisted hundreds of constituents who have already reached out asking for help due to impacts caused by Covid & we stand by ready to assist more. If you or someone you know is experiencing any issues with a federal agency, please reach out as well.

In addition to helping w/ UI cases, we‚Äôve secured back payments owed to veterans, worked w/ the State Dept. to help Nevadans stuck abroad due to travel restrictions get home safely, coordinated w/ state & local govs & medical facilities, & helped folks with IRS stimulus payments.

Even when a case doesn‚Äôt fall under our jurisdiction, my staff and I will always provide as much information as possible about available resources & point Nevadans in the right direction ‚Äì so please continue reaching out if you‚Äôre in need of assistance.

Constituent Services Update: With my support, NV has received over $3.4B so far for new UI programs & an additional $10M to help DETR offset increased admin costs. While these programs are ultimately handled by State officials, I'll keep intervening on your behalf where I can.

‚ÄúRep. Mark Amodei‚Äôs office has directly assisted 425 constituents with DETR-related casework issues‚Ä¶ Our office will continue intervening on constituents‚Äô behalf, helping them navigate DETR‚Äôs system, and providing assistance and access to important resources and information.‚Äù https://t.co/HZgVZc9Yd2

ICYMI: Earlier this week, the President signed an Executive Order to expand access to telehealth services, ensuring continued access to essential care for rural communities like ours. More here: https://t.co/ODJk7bV9uz

Sending another reminder about the importance of protecting yourself against scammers. If you believe someone has fraudulently filed an unemployment claim under your name, @DETRJobConnect recommends taking these steps: https://t.co/Wph2s7UaCC

Headed down to a House Approps Subcommittee Markup of the FY 2021 Interior & Environment appropriations bill. You may tune in using this link @ 11 AM ET (8 AM PT): https://t.co/vkoV6xKoFO

Another opportunity to make a meaningful difference on a critical issue‚Ä¶but instead, the Speaker brings a $1.5 trillion partisan wish list ‚Äì disguised as an infrastructure bill ‚Äì to the Floor without bothering to find a way to pay for it. Full statement: https://t.co/VBlqFvYMHH https://t.co/FaU382MYs1

The #USMCA takes effect today. This is great news for Nevada‚Äôs workers, farmers, ranchers, and businesses, as this historic agreement will lead to freer markets, fairer trade, and robust economic growth in America. https://t.co/n8n3r4ivYY

Thank you to all of the teen advocates for participating in the Virtual #TeenAdvocacyDay this week on behalf of the #CF community and for all that you do to raise awareness about CF and the importance of medical research: https://t.co/DFK56T7QkG

CF hits close to home for me. At the age of 15, I saw the effects of #CF on my own family when this cruel disease claimed my 9yr old cousin‚Äôs life. I immediately joined the CF Caucus on her behalf when I was elected to Congress & remain committed to this cause.

This week, nearly 200 teen advocates from across the country, almost half of whom are living with #cysticfibrosis, participated virtually in the @CF_Foundation‚Äôs 12th Annual #TeenAdvocacyDay: https://t.co/Pmm7J6fnfN

In this moment, when it comes to the critical issues in need of a solution, creating political messaging opportunities is the ultimate act of disrespect. Read my full statement on #HR7120 & why I support the #JUSTICEAct: https://t.co/SaFrE2gqXC

During these uncertain times, it‚Äôs important to protect yourself against scammers who are trying to take advantage of people. If you believe a scammer is receiving unemployment benefits in your name, here's a helpful resource on the steps you should take: https://t.co/QXNq1pGn3K

Check out @Citiz4Solutions newest blog post about the work my Western colleagues and I have done for our states in pursuit of clean energy developments: https://t.co/5by7HQxmOp

Joined @KNPRnews‚Äôs Joe Schoenmann on State of #Nevada  this week to discuss my work on the @ProbSolveCaucus & our recent and ongoing response efforts to #COVID19. My full interview here: https://t.co/88iKrJLmGx

Tune into @NewsTalk780KOH around 8:30 AM PT (11:30 AM ET), I‚Äôll be joining @thedanmasonshow to discuss the impacts being felt by @USPS as a result of #coronavirus  and other #COVID19 related updates: https://t.co/viZ0x4WwKA

Spoke w/ @theNVIndy‚Äôs @hsanchez128 this week for an inside look @ the work we put in from start to finish to ensure small gaming entities became eligible for the #PPP  ‚ÄúIt may be the most pressure I've ever felt that you have to deliver for your district" https://t.co/EB89RVOJIE

Great news for Nevada! More than $25 million in #coronavirus relief funds allocated to our state and local governments. Thank you @SecretaryCarson for looking out for the #SilverState during these uncertain times #HUDCARESAct @HUDgov https://t.co/O3y0fJ0bif

This morning, the #SBA announced it has resumed accepting applications for the #PaycheckProtectionProgram. Encouraging all small business owners in NV to head here for more info, including small gaming businesses who are now eligible for assistance: https://t.co/4MI3eUAUmS
Looking forward to it, Dan! Tune in around 8:05 AM PT (11:05 AM ET) to @NewsTalk780KOH. I'll be joining @thedanmasonshow for another #COVID19 update. https://t.co/inwk2GbfOS
Preview of my interview from earlier today with @KRNV‚Äôs Karsen Buschjost. Tune in to Channel 4 around 4 PM PT for more. https://t.co/dc3EU5jLyY

Thanks to WH COS Mark Meadows, Director of the US National Economic Council Larry Kudlow, the @GOPLeader, & the WH leg affairs team for working alongside us to get this done for these deserving businesses. Your individual efforts & those of your staff are greatly appreciated.

After speaking w/ officials at the SBA, we began working directly with Treasury & the WH to get it resolved. Yesterday, Secretary Mnuchin called to tell me small gaming businesses would finally be eligible for participation in the present round of PPP funding.
Since the interim rule release regarding PPP funding on Apr 2, my staff and I have been working to get it fixed for small gaming entities who were left out.
Pleased to report our efforts have paid off ‚Äì small gaming businesses will officially be eligible to receive PPP funding under guidance just released by Treasury. More here: https://t.co/HdcltPuW9q

Congressional intent of the CARES Act‚Äôs #PPP was for ALL small businesses to be eligible. As we continue working to secure much-needed relief for all deserving small businesses in NV, here are my remarks from today‚Äôs House Small Business Committee hearing: https://t.co/xZiyZSESBO

Back in Washington today to vote on the Paycheck Protection Program & Health Care Enhancement Act, a bill providing more relief for the job-saving programs that are helping small businesses. It also adds resources for hospitals & testing. More here: https://t.co/lVxixgC6pw

As we continue working around Treasury & SBA‚Äôs rule against small gaming entities, today I joined @repdinatitus & the entire NV House delegation to introduce the Equal Access to #COVID19 Relief Act, a bill to ensure these businesses & their workers get the help they deserve.

This is completely unacceptable. Speaker Pelosi was just touting we hadn‚Äôt even ‚Äúspent a third‚Äù of the PPP ‚Äúso we have time to negotiate." 7 days later‚Ä¶PPP funds are GONE. We repeatedly warned Dems about this & instead, they blocked a bill last week to renew PPP funding. https://t.co/L2mHlZpmB2

Good news is, more than $1B in relief has gone out to NV small businesses. Unfortunately, our small gaming entities are being refused help by SBA & Treasury, a decision that completely flies in the face of everything the CARES Act stands for. More here: https://t.co/qKHb23dFzw

In my continued effort to rescue NV‚Äôs small gaming businesses & their workers, today I joined the entire NV House Delegation to again denounce the SBA & Treasury‚Äôs discrimination against these deserving small businesses & how we plan to help: https://t.co/bwHQcES3hg

The cultural arrogance at @SBAgov that has apparently allowed the agency to blithely decide who #Congress was attempting to help under CARES... is stunning. ICYM my recent statement on why SBA needs to implement a fix to assist small gaming businesses: https://t.co/x5DJvf7VUS
Nevada airports are set to receive more than $230 million in CARES Act relief that will help save jobs, address current challenges, and keep our airports operating. More here: https://t.co/tVhvoKEagd

A big thanks to @USTreasury for fast-tracking the ability of eligible State, local, and tribal govs to receive payments from the Coronavirus Relief Fund, giving NV access to $1.25 billion in funding to help offset COVID-19 costs. Full statement: https://t.co/ugw6vP5wZy
Joining @thedanmasonshow around 8:05 AM PT for another #coronavirus update. Listen live here: https://t.co/viZ0x4WwKA @newstalk780koh #NevadaStrong

Great news from @HHSGov today. Nevada is set to receive more than $240M from the initial allocation of the Provider Relief Fund which was established under the #CARESAct. Most providers can expect direct deposits today. My full statement here: https://t.co/VZHmP5p0eD

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for continuing to look out for Nevada. Your willingness to look into & fix @SBAgov‚Äôs antiquated, bureaucratic rule will save small casinos & thousands of jobs for Nevadans & others being denied relief during this difficult time https://t.co/yX8ceotAth

This #WorldHealthDay, we are especially grateful to all of our medical professionals and first responders who are working around the clock to combat #COVID19 to make the world a healthier place. Thank you for your strength & resilience during this uncertain time. #InItTogether https://t.co/DFUs2W9G7j

Fill out your #NevadaCensus @ https://t.co/GJHOF0UXft https://t.co/duHGOmfucN

Joining @thedanmasonshow around 8:05 AM Pacific on 
@NewsTalk780KOH to discuss the latest updates surrounding #coronavirus. Listen live here: https://t.co/ChVdbZkjbu
